data.title: Where is John Gotti Jr now? Is he the Gambino family boss?
data.meta_description: Where is John Gotti Jr now? The former American mobster lives in New York City and is an author. Check out this article to find out more about his life history.
data.text:
Throughout the 1980s and the early 1990s, John Gotti used his vast wealth and power to run the Gambino crime family in New York City. His leadership style made the Gambino crime family the most powerful organised crime syndicate in the United States until his arrest and sentencing. The void in the leadership that resulted made John Angelo Gotti Jr take over the leadership. Where is John Gotti Jr. now, and is he the head of the Gambino crime family today?

John Gotti Jr. is a former mobster. He is well known for being the acting boss of the Gambino crime family. Junior took over the syndicate's leadership from 1991 after the arrest of his father. He headed the group until 1999, when the authorities indicted him on racketeering charges. Where is John Gotti Jr now? Find out today.

Who is John Gotti Jr?

John is a former American mobster born John Angelo Gotti in Queens, New York, United States of America. He is the son of John Gotti (father) and Victoria DiGiorgio Gotti (mother). He has four siblings named Victoria, Angela, Frank, and Peter Gotti.

His brother, Frank, died on 18 March 1980, aged 12, after a neighbour’s car ran over him. The neighbour who drove the vehicle vanished months later. His father died in 2002 in prison aged 61 after battling throat cancer.

Where is John Gotti Jr now?

John Gotti Jr is currently based in Oyster Bay Cove, Long Island, New York, United States of America. He is a published author who maintains that he has left the Gambino family.

Who was John Gotti Jr’s father?

John Gotti Jr.’s father was a famous criminal, gangster, and the head of the Gambino crime family. He ruled the streets of New York throughout the 80s into the early 90s.

He was later arrested, convicted, and jailed for life after the court found him guilty on 13 counts, including murder and racketeering.

How old is John Gotti Jr today?

As of 2024, John Gotti Jr is 60 years old. He was born on 14 February 1964. His zodiac sign is Aquarius.

Which school did John Gotti Jr attend?

The personality grew up in a two-story house in Howard Beach, New York. He attended New York Military Academy, a college preparatory, co-ed boarding school in Cornwall.

After finishing his high school studies, he did not attend college or university. Instead, his father helped him become an entrepreneur. He opened a business called Samson Trucking.

What does John Gotti Jr do for a living?

John Gotti Jr is a published author. Before becoming one, he ran Samson Trucking. The trucking business went on well for some time before failing.

He then went to work for the Carpenters Union. In 1985, his father became the boss of the Gambino crime family. He was gradually inducted into a criminal life. Three years later, when he was in his mid-20s, he became an official member of the Gambino Family.

His father’s influence made him a crime family captain. As a result, he made history as the youngest capo or captain in the family’s history. The position forced him to learn the ropes of the underworld, including the rackets like loansharking.

In 1992, the authorities charged and convicted his father of racketeering and murder. This created a leadership gap. Gotti Jr. became the acting boss of the Gambino crime family.

Like his father, he fell on the wrong side of the law. In 1999, the authorities charged and convicted him of racketeering. He accepted a deal from prosecutors to serve seven years in prison.

Between 2004 and 2009, many cases, including old ones, came his way, and he became a defendant on many occasions. Unlike his father, all his cases ended in a mistrial.

In January 2010, his prosecutors dropped all his charges, so he was set free. In 2015, he became a published author.

He released his first book, Shadow of My Father. Several producers also released a film in 2018 called Gotti. In June 2018, a documentary TV miniseries titled Gotti: Godfather and Son aired. He participated in all productions.

Was John Gotti Jr an informant?

Gotti Jr. was accused of being a government informant. The accusations came when he was undergoing trial for racketeering and stock fraud charges. The charges carried a potential sentence of 100 years.

The former famous criminal expressed anger at the indictment, believing that he had immunity for the alleged charges due to a prior plea agreement with the U.S. attorney's office. In response, he declared his intention to feed the federal prosecutors useless or entirely false information, vowing never to testify against anyone.

His strategy aimed at securing a favorable plea deal while implicating two adversaries, reputed capo Daniel Marino and associate Joseph (Joe the German) Watts, with the federal authorities.

Despite its uncertainty to others, particularly his ex-underling John Alite, Gotti pursued this plan, resulting in him being criticised as a "rat."

How did John Gotti Jr. make his money?

As of 2024, John Gotti Jr's net worth is $10 million. He worked as the leader of the Gambino crime family for several years until his arrest.

His wealth is mostly his inheritance, especially because he spent time in prison, where he was not making any money. He decided to do legitimate business after his release from prison.

In 1997, the police searched his home and found $348,700 in cash. They also found a list of individuals who contributed to his wedding. The gifts totalled $350,000.

On 4 September 1999, the court sentenced Gotti Jr. to six years and five months in prison and fined him $1 million.

He is now an author who has sold millions of copies of his book. He has also worked with film producers to produce a film and TV documentary about his relationship with his father.

Who is married to John Gotti Jr?

Gotti Jr. is married and has children. John Gotti Jr's wife is Kimberly Albanese. The two got married in 1990 and were blessed with six kids.

Some of John Gotti Jr's kids are Nicolette, Charles Herbert, John Gotti III, and Gianna. John Gotti III is a professional MMA fighter.

Is John Gotti Jr still alive?

Yes, John Gotti Jr. is alive. He maintains that he has since left the Gambino family, and denied claims that he was an informant. Over the years, there have been many rumours of John Gotti Jr's death, but they are all inaccurate.

What happened to John Gotti Jr?

John Gotti Jr is still alive and was released from prison in 2005. He has mostly maintained a low-key life since his release from prison.

His name recently resurfaced after his wife and daughter, Kimberly and Gianna Gotti, were arrested for assault. The two were accused of punching a woman in the face at a basketball game at Locust Valley High School.

The incident happened in February 2024. John Gotti Jr's daughter was offered a plea deal that included misdemeanours and 12 weeks of anger management classes. Sherejected the plea deal.

Where is John Gotti Jr today?

As of 2024, Gotti Jr lives with his family in Oyster Bay Cove on Long Island’s North Shore in New York City.

Even though he continues to be recognised as the son of John Gotti and a former member of the mob, he has been leading a private life and has distanced himself from the crime syndicate.

Who runs the Gambino family now?

Until May 2019, Frank Cali served as the head of the Gambino Crime family. After Cali's demise, reports indicated that Lorenzo Mannino had assumed the role of the new Gambino leader, holding the positions of both leader and street boss, but did not hold the official title of boss.

In 2021, it was revealed that Domenico Cefalù, an Italian-American mobster, had taken on the role of the boss for the Gambino crime family in New York City.

Fast facts

Angelo Ruggiero was his godfather and middle namesake.

He was inducted into the Gambino crime family on Christmas Eve in 1988.

His father's funeral was held in a non-church facility.

His father's body was interred in a crypt next to his brother, Frank.

In November 2013, he was stabbed while breaking up a fight in Syosset, New York.

Where is John Gotti Jr now? John Gotti Jr now lives with his family in Oyster Bay Cove on Long Island’s North Shore in New York City. He opted to leave behind the mob life and became an author.
